tool_description: Online pornographic image detection checks accurately and quickly whether an image is ‘normal’, ‘sexy’, or ‘pornographic’, helping users to distinguish porn images. This technology greatly increases the accuracy of pornographic content detection.
name: Porn Image Detection
title: Porn Image Detection

api_list.name: Image Detection
api_list.description:
**Request Parameters:**

- image_url==>	**[Required]**	Image URL

**Response Objects Description:**
The probability of picture detection results is divided into the following 5 categories:

- Porn==>	Adult erotic pictures
- Sexy==>	Sexy pictures
- Neutral==>	Normal picture
- Drawing==>	Normal painting
- Hentai==>	Porn painting
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://porn-image-detection.p.rapidapi.com/nsfw/https://sf.xiex.io/porn.jpg"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "porn-image-detection.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://porn-image-detection.p.rapidapi.com/nsfw/{image_url}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "porn-image-detection.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
